params.name: feature_size
params.description: The feature dimension of the extracted features.

params.name: sampling_rate
params.description: The sampling rate at which the audio files should be digitalized expressed in hertz (Hz).

params.name: max_length
params.description: Maximum length to which to pad/truncate the extracted features.

params.name: do_normalize
params.description: Whether or not to normalize the log-Mel features using mean and std.

params.name: mean
params.description: The mean value used to normalize the log-Mel features. Uses the AudioSet mean by default.

params.name: std
params.description: The standard deviation value used to normalize the log-Mel features. Uses the AudioSet standard deviationby default.

params.name: return_attention_mask
params.description: Whether or not call() should return attention_mask.
